ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hahahahaha! That happened to us too, damn funny! This weekend, a chanter s finger slipped and hit a 1 sec tashani spell or something during buffing and guess
ygData.messageBody:
Hahahahaha!
That happened to us too, damn funny!

This weekend, a chanter's finger slipped and hit a 1 sec tashani spell or
something during buffing and guess who came out of the woodwork to lay the
smackdown on us :)

Halana/Tani

> -----Original Message-----
> From: jay schultze [mailto:sartori69@...]
> Sent: Sunday, November 19, 2000 1:10 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
>
>
> I almost got killed by Gorenaire when I was watching a guild
> fight her. I
> was totally unbuffed and when her AE hit me it dropped me
> well under 30%
> life so I hauled ass. =) She cons kindly to me, and never
> agrroed me. I'm
> not sure what caused her to go aggro on you. During downtime
> in VP some
> friends of mine decided to duel (don't EVER do this in VP),
> and Hoshkar, who
> is kindly to me, stand right on top of me and kill them. His
> AE hit me HARD,
> but he walked away after my friends died w/out aggroing me. *shrug*
>
> Sartori{Legion}
> 57th Troubador
> Veeshan
>
>
> >Side question about Gorenaire. I was fighting along the
> castle north wall
> >in Dreads when a Gorenaire raid was going on. I conned the
> dragon and I
> >was
> >either warmly or amiable. So I got close to take some
> screenshots since
> >this was the first time I had ever seen a dragon. I had
> Selos up and was
> >standing right in front of Gorenaire when she decided to
> swat me. Before I
> >realized what was going on, I was back at my bind point.
> >
> >So did I die to a bug or will Gorenaire, once aggroed,
> attack anyone near
> >her, even if they weren't involved in the attack? BTW I was
> not in wolf
> >form nor was I grouped with anyone at the time who had pets
> (which I have
> >been told will cause her to attack you).
> Galtin of E'ci>
>
